pli-tv-pvr2.16:1.3_0: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ gahaṇaṁ sādiyati,
pli-tv-pvr2.16:1.4_0: bhikkhu kāyena kāyaṁ āmasati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.16:1.8_0: kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.16:2.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.16:2.6_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.16:2.11_0: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr2.16:2.14_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe….
pli-tv-pvr2.16:3.1_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.16:3.2_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.16:3.5_0: dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.16:4.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.16:4.6_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ ekaṁ vipattiṁ bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.16:4.11_0: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.16:4.12_0: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.16:4.13_0: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr2.16:4.14_0: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr2.16:4.17_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena cāti.
